name: My Kiddy ice Cream Salon
description:
My Kiddy Ice Cream Salon:
For most of us eating an ice cream is like creating a memory each time. So, with this app we have tried doing just that for you!
Create ice creams with flavors and toppings that you only dreamt of. Let your imagination run wild as you create scoop after scoop of delicious frozen happiness that no other store offers!

Features:
•Appealing ice cream flavors.
•Cool choice of bowls, plates and cones for serving.
•Garnish with delicious array of toppings and add-ons.
•Earn coins and stars in each level to unlock many more flavors, containers and toppings!
•Take a picture of your delicious ice cream.
•Share with friends on Facebook.
•Earn daily bonus coins.
As these apps are free, they may contain third party advertisements.
